alert.note: Alert for Baker Valley; Burns BLM; Vale BLM (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 02 at 8:22AM PDT until August 04 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR SCATTERED LIGHTNING FOR SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS, OWYHEE MOUNTAINS, AND WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM... .Storms are expected this afternoon and evening, leading to a Red Flag Warning for the Southern Highlands, Twin Falls BLM, and the Owyhee Mountains. In addition, a Fire Weather Watch remains in effect from Thursday afternoon through Friday evening for all but the NF districts, again due to scattered thunderstorms. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR LIGHTNING FOR NORTHERN BOISE BLM... TREASURE VALLEY BLM...BURNS BLM...VALE BLM AND BAKER VALLEY... WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 400...420...636...637 AND 646... * THUNDERSTORMS...Scattered. * OUTFLOW WINDS...Up to 50 mph.

area.areaDesc: Baker Valley; Burns BLM; Vale BLM
